column1:
Overall, the negative sentiment percentages for Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services, and Value have been going down over the years. 

Cleaniness: The percentage of negative sentiment towards Cleaniness has decreased from 27.9% in 2019 to 16.2% in 2023. Suggestions to further improve the cleaniness are to improve hygiene standards by adhering to health and safety guidelines and regularly maintaining results. 

Amenities: The percentage of negative sentiment towards Amenities has decreased from 19.8% in 2019 to no data in 2020 and 2021. Suggestions to further improve the amenities are to provide more facilities such as high-speed internet, food service, and better entertainment options. 

Location: The percentage of negative sentiment towards Location has decreased from 13.3% in 2019 to no data in 2020 and 2021. Suggestions to further improve the location are to invest in further development around the area by introducing better public transportation and more tourist attractions. 

Services: The percentage of negative sentiment towards Services has increased from 33.2% in 2019 to 35.1% in 2020. Suggestions to further improve the services are to ensure better customer service and improved quality of the services offered. 

Value: The percentage of negative sentiment towards Value has decreased from 20.8% in 2019 to 24.9% in 2021 and 27.5% in 2022. Suggestions to further improve the value are to offer additional benefits to the customers such as discounts and promotions.
